Audio.Locality: La Aurora, Serrania de los Yariguies, Galan, Santander, Colombia
Audio.Author: Thomas Donegan
Audio.Comments: Ref: Donegan TM, Avendaño JE, Briceño ER & Huertas BC. 2007. Bird range extensions with taxonomic and ecological notes from Serranía de los Yariguíes, Colombias new National Park. Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club 127(3): 172-213.
